content: Anyone else trying to access HL7.org and not able to? 3p MDT here on 2018-05-06
Hi Rob, was just thinking of you today as I ground my coffee... site is up for me (now 7 PM EDT
rob, you are correct. JRun had a memory issue and the site stopped responding about 4:47 EST, I was on my home from an event and restored the service at 5:23.
I use the website uptime robot to monitor our systems. But every little bit helps. Thanks for checking here!
